About Me:

This is where I'm supposed to write about myself. This is where you would usually read about how I'm a web developer, husband, dog dad, or how I like to solve puzzles. But if you are reading this, chances are you came to my website with a problem. Maybe you are looking for someone to build you a website, or update your current one. Maybe your shop's app is not working, or you own a growing business that needs more presence on the web. You probably came here because you have a puzzle that is missing some pieces.

Hey, I like solving puzzles.

I may refer to myself a "web developer", but really I'm a problem solver. And I would really like to help solve yours.
